propDescriptions.activeStep: Set the active step (zero based index). Set to -1 to disable all the steps.
propDescriptions.alternativeLabel: If set to 'true' and orientation is horizontal, then the step label will be positioned under the icon.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.connector: An element to be placed between each step.
propDescriptions.nonLinear: If set the Stepper will not assist in controlling steps for linear flow.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
